verses.content: LALPA chu inpâk ro. Aw LALPA siehlawhai, inpâk unla, LALPA hming chu inpâk ro.
LALPA hming chu inpâkin um raw se, Tuta inthawka kumkhaw- tluongin.
Nisa suoknaa inthawka a tlâk- na chenin, LALPA hming chu inpâk ding a nih.
LALPA chu hnam tinrênghai chunga chun chunghnung dai a na, A ropuina chun vânhai khi a khûm dai a nih.
LALPA ei Pathien ang tu am an um a? Chungtienga ṭhungpha neia,
Vâna thil umhai le hnuoia thil umhai en dinga, Insukhnuoi hlak ang hi tu am an um a?
Ama chun rimsi chu pilvuta inthawk chun a keitho hlak a, Pasie chu êkthlia inthawk chun a dawm kâng hlak;
Mi lienhai kuoma ân umtir theina dingin, A mihai laia mi lienhai kuoma ngei chun.
Ama chun nuhmei ching chu in le lo ân vawngtir hlak a, Nau nei mi hlimtakah a siem hlak; LALPA chu inpâk ro.
